OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord prostate-specific antigen level ( great 10 ng/mL v great 10 great 20 ng/mL v great 20 ng/mL ) , tumor stage ( T1b-2 v T3-4 ) , Gleason score ( 2-4 v 5-6 vs 7-10 ) , prior hormonal therapy ( yes v ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive total androgen suppression 8 week prior initiation radiotherapy throughout radiotherapy . A luteinizing hormone-releasing hormone ( LHRH ) agonist administer every 1-3 month AND bicalutamide OR flutamide give orally daily total duration 16 week . Beginning week 9 , patient undergo radiotherapy 5 day week 8 week . - Arm II : Patients receive total androgen suppression 28 week prior initiation radiotherapy throughout radiotherapy . An LHRH agonist AND bicalutamide OR flutamide administer arm I total duration 36 week . Beginning week 29 , patient undergo radiotherapy arm I . Patients follow every 3 month 1 year , every 6 month 4 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 1,540 patient ( 770 per treatment arm ) accrue study within 4 year .
